title: 新人
txt_content: 大家好，我是新人。请多指教{:soso_e100:}

replies.txt_content:
你们的表情怎么都变成这种了？

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content: hello newbie, I am cyq and I will be speaking english for a while. get used to this.

cyqsimon 发表于 2014-1-16 21:38 
hello newbie, I am cyq and I will be speaking english for a while. get used to this.
